thread.title: How a Pregnant Actress Overcame Her Frustrations With the Industry and Directed Her First Feature
thread.title_full: How a Pregnant Actress Overcame Her Frustrations With the Industry and Directed Her First Feature

author: Kate Erbland
title: How a Pregnant Actress Overcame Her Frustrations With the Industry and Directed Her First Feature
text: "Prevenge" filmmaker and star Alice Lowe was worried she had run out of time to launch her filmmaking career. That's exactly when it all came together.
